mcq.statement: Ch Rahmat Ali published a leaflet "Now are Never .We to live or Perish forever issued on January 28,1933; from Cambridge with the objective .

options.a: To create a separate and independent Muslim state
options.b: To grow the concept of Indianism
options.c: To develop amity with the British as a Muslim community
options.d: To work with other Indian communities for liberation of India
